transcript:
Customer: Rahul change company ka name Rahul. 
[inaudible]
Hello.
Executive: Hello, hi ma'am. Good evening, main Hemant baat kar raha hun IndiaMART se.
Customer: Okay.
Executive: Ma'am hamari team ne aapko subah guide kiya hoga. Saari cheeze training aapne hi li thi ma'am. Kaise buyleads consume karna hai, Goa ki buyleads kaise filter aap.
Customer: Nahi nahi, maine nahi liya tha. Main.
Executive: Aapki koi head tha.
Customer: [inaudible]
Executive: Haan, toh theek hai, main bata deta hun. Subah hamari team ne unko saari cheeze guide kar di ma'am. Ki jo buyleads aapko jo bas Goa se chahiye toh kaise milengi. Toh saari training humne de di hai ma'am. Right?
Customer: One minute, one minute.
Executive: Okay okay.
Customer: Hello.
Executive: Haan ma'am, good evening.
Customer: Good evening.
Executive: Haan ma'am, Hemant baat kar raha hun. Senior manager IndiaMART se. Meenakshi ke manager baat kar raha hun. Morning mein apne aapko Meenakshi ne baat kiya hoga. Saari cheeze aapko guide ki hongi ma'am. Ki kaise buyleads Goa se milengi, kaise filter lagana hai. Jo buyleads.
Customer: No, she did not contact me. She must have contacted some other number.
Executive: Okay.
Customer: Haan.
Executive: Okay ma'am. Matlab unko humne training de di ma'am. Aap please unse le lijiye, jankari le lijiyega. Kyunki aur koi toh doubt nahi hai na ki kaise IndiaMART use karna hai. Okay ma'am.
Customer: Haan haan. Haan haan.
Executive: Theek hai. Abhi hamare Meenakshi ne jo training diya. Kya hua ki kal ne jo aapne jo handler hai shayad unhone phone kiya tha toh Meenakshi ne call kar nahi paayi. Toh uske bihaf pe ticket raise hoti hai ma'am ki aapne phone kiya humne response nahi kiya. But humne morning mein saari cheeze aapke doubt ko clear kar diya ma'am. Toh please abhi services use kariye. Aur unko unke paas Meenakshi ji ka number bhi hai. Toh koi bhi X Y Z koi bhi concern hota hai ma'am toh direct unke number pe Meenakshi ke hi number pe call karwa dijiyega ma'am. Theek hai?
Customer: Aur Meenakshi na thoda thoda maine usko share kiya tha. Toh update karne wali thi. Thoda thoda kiya usne, aadha nahi kiya.
Executive: Ma'am dekho ma'am, main baat kar leta hun. Dekho kya hota hai na, hamare paas bhi kaafi clients hote hai ma'am. Woh one by one hi hum aaram se karenge ma'am. Abhi jaldi baazi mein kyun na phir aur bhi tasks hote hai. Toh ma'am aisa nahi ki unhone aapne diya toh karenge nahi. Daily basis pe woh kuch na kuch dheere dheere karke do teen din mein update karte hai.
Customer: Last month diya tha.
Customer: Last month aapko diya tha, abhi tak update nahi kiya.
Executive: Achha last month diya tha abhi tak nahi hua. Aapne cross check kiya. Koi baat nahi main dobara ek baar cross check kar leta hun ma'am. Theek hai? Aur usko ma'am next agle Monday tak aapko kehna nahi padega ma'am. Agle Monday tak toh usko update karwa dunga. Theek hai? Main dekh leta hun kitne products hai. Toh urgent basis pe aapke woh products main add kara deta hun. Okay ma'am?
Customer: Okay sir. Okay.
Executive: Toh please ma'am woh jo incoming call tha uska ek ticket hota hai toh hum ticket close karenge toh feedback jayega. Toh please apna feedback zaroor share kariega ma'am. Theek hai? Koi doubt toh nahi hai ma'am usme koi matlab not satisfied jaisa koi scene ma'am ki aap satisfied nahi ho. Agar koi doubt hai ma'am toh abhi please mujhe call pe bata do main usko doubt ko clear kar deta hun. Toh phir main ticket close karta hun ma'am.
Customer: Nahi aisa koi kuch dikkat nahi hai.
Executive: Theek hai ma'am. Toh please apna feedback zaroor share kariega ma'am. Theek hai? Baaki ma'am koi bhi issue hota hai toh Meenakshi ka number aapke paas hai. Main unka senior baat kar raha hun. Aap unse bol dijiyega ki apne senior se baat kara toh mujhse baat kara dena. Baaki ma'am Monday tak main aapki cheezon ko update kara dunga.
Customer: Okay. Okay sir.
Executive: Okay, thank you ma'am.
summary:
Concerns:

- Customer's product update pending since last month.

- Meenakshi did not contact the customer.



Resolution:

- Executive assured update by next Monday.

- Executive offered to add products urgently.

- Executive requested feedback on the call.



Next Steps: 

None

Alert (If Any):

None

@@@Sentiment:

- Neutral -> Satisfied



@@@Key Topics:

- product update, buyleads, feedback, training
